Message on Senate action sent to the House.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

official_title: A bill to amend the Nutrition Labeling and Education Act of 1990 to impose a moratorium with respect to the issuance of regulations on dietary supplements.
short_title: Dietary Supplement Regulation Moratorium Act of 1993
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Dietary Supplement Regulation Moratorium Act of 1993 - Prohibits the Secretary of Health and Human Services from implementing the Nutrition Labeling and Education Act of 1990 or any amendment made by such Act earlier than April 15, 1994, with respect to dietary supplements of vitamins, minerals, herbs, amino acids, or other similar nutritional substances. Prohibits the Secretary from issuing any final regulations applicable to such substances before that date. Specifies that any such proposed regulations shall not be considered to be final regulations until that date. Makes the effective date for provisions dealing with State enforcement with respect to such substances April 30, 1994.

titles.title: Dietary Supplement Regulation Moratorium Act of 1993
A bill to amend the Nutrition Labeling and Education Act of 1990 to impose a moratorium with respect to the issuance of regulations on dietary supplements.
